action.action-desc: Mrs. Halvorson introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to make permanent the extension of the duration of Servicemembers’ Group Life Insurance coverage for totally disabled veterans.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Families of Veterans Financial Security Act.

section.header: Permanent extension of duration of Servicemembers’ Group Life Insurance coverage for totally disabled veterans

subsection.text: Section 1968(a) of title 38, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (1)(A), by striking clause (ii) and inserting the following new clause (ii):

clause.text: The date that is two years after the date of separation or release from such active duty or active duty for training.

paragraph.text: in paragraph (4), by striking subparagraph (B) and inserting the following new subparagraph (B):

subparagraph.text: The date that is two years after the date of separation or release from such assignment.

subsection.text: The amendments made by subsection (a) shall apply with respect to a person who is separated or released on or after June 15, 2005.
